claims.object: A method to provide a constant voltage output at the power supply under varying load conditions.

surface_layer.definition: A circuit that maintains a constant voltage level despite variations in load current or input voltage.
common_uses: Maintaining stable voltage in electronic devices
Protecting sensitive components from voltage fluctuations

deep_layer.mechanism: Feedback mechanisms and active components adjust the output voltage to maintain a desired level.
deep_layer.origin: Evolved from early Zener diode circuits to integrated voltage regulator ICs.
